items.metataghtml: <meta name="description" content="Beautify™’s Perfecting Spray is an essential step in taking care of your client’s synthetic hair extensions.">
items.storedetaileddescription:
Beautify™’s Perfecting Spray is an essential step in taking care of your client’s synthetic hair extensions. This spray removes frizz, adds moisture, and restores life to damaged strands, leaving the hair feeling sleek and smooth with no residue. It’s one of the best ways to take care of your synthetic extensions and empower confidence in your clients!

Keep the product away from heat, humidity, and light. Store in a well-ventilated, cool, dark, dry, room-temperature controlled environment (60-80°F). Close bottle lids tightly.

With proper storage, our liquid products have a shelf life of up to six months.
items.outofstockbehavior: Allow back orders with no out-of-stock message
items.featureddescription:
Close lid tightly.
Do not apply to broken, cut, or irritated skin.
External use only, do not ingest.
Avoid eye contact.
Keep out of reach of children.
Test on a small area before use.
Store in a well-ventilated, cool, dark, dry, room-temperature controlled environment (60-80°F).
items.displayname: Beautify - Perfecting Spray - 12 fl oz, Spray..
items.storedisplayname2: Beautify - Perfecting Spray - 12 fl oz, Spray
items.storedescription:
Spray on wet or dry synthetic hair as needed for a moisturized look and feel. Adds moisture and detangles.

We recommend performing a patch test before use.
